attributes.action: Stop facebook allowing their site to be used to publicaly abuse the pictures of deceased babies and the sick jokes about them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Facebook at this time has received more than enough complaints and reports from its users to remove the pictures and the sick jokes about deceased babies, on this group there are upsetting pictures of children of all ages being abused, mistreated and dead.  They havent shut the group down so we are requesting the Prime Ministers help to get it removed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the company involved.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
